content: I'm a pro at ramming trees. Moo problem at all!
Moo? Is there any good stuff left to gather around here?
Yeep-eee? Your backpack seems...
Mmmooo? Your backpack is almost full.
The fish from the prophecy...
Yeep? Another one taking the bait?
Fruits so sweet, crops so fine, golden wheat stacked up high.
Boring. Lemme give it a nice kick...
That plushie model bug won't stop scurrying around!
Yeep... p-pincers?!
Stay away, you seafood, or I'll get mad loh~!
Leave a little space in your backpack, so it stays all floofalicious!
Your backpack is at its limit...
The grass here tastes salty.
Can't catch it... that bug plushie inspiration's slipping away.
Mmph, fish... I'm not scared!
Woopsie, your backpack's full.
Hold on, I'll headbutt some wood for you.
Let's hit it big!
A stroll on the Islet, baa-rilliant!
Any... mysterious phenomena?
Nope... don't sense anything else, mm...
Mmmooo? Didn't bump into anything good out here.
The water's full of... mmph...
Those seafood are beating me up!
Bug!!! RUN â€” Mmmooo?
Bhan them out!
Take this! Kokoro Ichiryu!
How about we do some stargazing...
Yeee? There's nothing left around here mah.
Uh-oh, looks like the backpack's too full?
Moo? Your backpack's almost full? I'll stop for now.
Watch how ore-some I am!
Floofaliciously... stored!
Daikabutomaru!
Bhan... so sleepy...
Your bag is almost full!
I bet your backpack can fit it all!
Slot by slot, nice and neat.
Inspiration for plushies...?
Looks like the trap's at its limit, hm?
Anythin' else we should take home?
Wanna sort out your bag? There's too much stuff.
I'll make it fit! If that doesn't work, I'll carry it on my head!
Sorry, shore-dwellers' pincers...
BUG!... What just happened, moo?
It's about to overflow, hm?!
Harvest calls, it's workin' time...
What's that? Bhan it!
